item.title: Download BoostPing 1.6.4
item.description: BoostPing helps optimize your online gaming experience by modifying the network throttling index and disabling the Nagle algorithm. By turning this feature off, you can achieve more instantaneous data transfer speeds, potentially reducing latency. What is Nagle's algorithm? The Nagle algorithm is designed to improve network efficiency by combining small data packets into larger packets, which can cause lag in online games. Disabling it can result in more responsive gameplay. On the...
